## utils.svgPaths.line() function

Draw multiple lines connecting all of the given points in order. This is equivalent to a series of 'l' commands. These coordinates are unitless and hence in the user coordinate system. See developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Tutorial/Paths\#Line\_commands

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function line(points: string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  points | string\[\] | An array containing all of the points to draw lines to, in order. The points are represented as strings of the format ' dx,dy '. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

A string of the format ' l (dx,dy)+ '
